isis.stitle: TSI 91-16-04 - Cab Extender on 96/9700 Vehicles With 100-inch Cabs (Code 16177 or 16178 Hi-Rise)

subjectgroup.subject: Cab Extender on 96/9700 Vehicles With 100-inch Cabs (Code 16177 or 16178 Hi-Rise)

geninfo.para: In mid 1991, International will start producing 96/9700 series vehicles with 110-inch cabs (Code 16177 or 16178 Hi-Rise) with cab extenders, without the center mounting bracket on the cab extender. Refer to Figure 1 and Figure 2for details. Attempts should not be made to add the center support as the cab inner reinforcements have been deleted.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Old Extender With Center Mounting Bracket
Figure 2. New Extender Without Center Mounting Bracket
